trans-unit.source: Sets the background color of a control.

seg-source.mrk: Sets the background color of a control.

target.mrk: Sets the background color of a control.

trans-unit.source: Parameters
The control identifier (controlID) as returned by a GUICtrlCreate...() function, or -1 for the last created control.

seg-source.mrk: The control identifier (controlID) as returned by a GUICtrlCreate...() function, or -1 for the last created control.

target.mrk: The control identifier (controlID) as returned by a GUICtrlCreate...() function, or -1 for the last created control.

trans-unit.source: The RGB color to use.
Return Value
Remarks
Only Button, Label, Checkbox, Group, Radio, Edit, Input, List, Listview, ListviewItem, Treeview, TreeviewItem, Graphic, Progress, Slider and Combo controls can currently be colored.

seg-source.mrk: Only Button, Label, Checkbox, Group, Radio, Edit, Input, List, Listview, ListviewItem, Treeview, TreeviewItem, Graphic, Progress, Slider and Combo controls can currently be colored.

target.mrk: Only Button, Label, Checkbox, Group, Radio, Edit, Input, List, Listview, ListviewItem, Treeview, TreeviewItem, Graphic, Progress, Slider and Combo controls can currently be colored.

trans-unit.source: Progress controls cannot be painted if the "Windows XP style" is used.

seg-source.mrk: Progress controls cannot be painted if the "Windows XP style" is used.

target.mrk: Progress controls cannot be painted if the "Windows XP style" is used.

trans-unit.source: Checkbox, Radio, Group Progress, Combo controls cannot be painted if the "Windows XP/Vista style" is used.

seg-source.mrk: Checkbox, Radio, Group Progress, Combo controls cannot be painted if the "Windows XP/Vista style" is used.

target.mrk: Checkbox, Radio, Group Progress, Combo controls cannot be painted if the "Windows XP/Vista style" is used.

trans-unit.source: Button controls are always painted in "Windows Classic style". They cannot have the $BS_ICON style.

seg-source.mrk: Button controls are always painted in "Windows Classic style".

target.mrk: Button controls are always painted in "Windows Classic style".

trans-unit.source: The special flag $GUI_BKCOLOR_TRANSPARENT can be used with Label, Group, Radio, Checkbox controls to give them a transparent background.

seg-source.mrk: The special flag $GUI_BKCOLOR_TRANSPARENT can be used with Label, Group, Radio, Checkbox controls to give them a transparent background.

target.mrk: The special flag $GUI_BKCOLOR_TRANSPARENT can be used with Label, Group, Radio, Checkbox controls to give them a transparent background.

trans-unit.source: The special flag $GUI_BKCOLOR_LV_ALTERNATE can be used with Listview control to give alternate background of the ListviewItems lines.

seg-source.mrk: The special flag $GUI_BKCOLOR_LV_ALTERNATE can be used with Listview control to give alternate background of the ListviewItems lines.

target.mrk: The special flag $GUI_BKCOLOR_LV_ALTERNATE can be used with Listview control to give alternate background of the ListviewItems lines.

trans-unit.source: The odd lines will get the color set by GUICtrlSetBkColor() of the Listview control.

seg-source.mrk: The odd lines will get the color set by GUICtrlSetBkColor() of the Listview control.

target.mrk: The odd lines will get the color set by GUICtrlSetBkColor() of the Listview control.

trans-unit.source: The even lines will get the color set by GUICtrlSetBkColor() of the ListviewItem control.

seg-source.mrk: The even lines will get the color set by GUICtrlSetBkColor() of the ListviewItem control.

target.mrk: The even lines will get the color set by GUICtrlSetBkColor() of the ListviewItem control.

trans-unit.source: Related
GUICtrlCreate..., GUICtrlSetColor, GUICtrlSetDefBkColor
Example
Create a GUI with various controls.

seg-source.mrk: Create a GUI with various controls.

target.mrk: Create a GUI with various controls.

trans-unit.source: Example
Create a label control.
A string of text
Close
Set the background color of the label control.

seg-source.mrk: Set the background color of the label control.

target.mrk: Set the background color of the label control.

trans-unit.source: Display the GUI.
Loop until the user exits.
Delete the previous GUI and all controls.

seg-source.mrk: Delete the previous GUI and all controls.

target.mrk: Delete the previous GUI and all controls.
